title: WeChat Mini Program
original_prompt: Create a WeChat Mini Program page with wxml, js, wxss, and json files that implements a [Project]. Provide only the necessary code to meet these requirements without explanations or descriptions.
input1: Create a WeChat Mini Program page that implements a personal finance tracker, allowing users to input their income and expenses, categorize them, and view a summary of their financial status.
input2: Create a WeChat Mini Program page that implements a recipe sharing platform, enabling users to upload their favorite recipes, search for recipes by ingredients, and save their favorite recipes for easy access.
